thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Emilia Garcia

author: Emilia Garcia
title: Emilia Garcia
text: I look in so many sites of Internet for my travels and flighthub have the best price of all them. :) I'm very happy I buy 2 flight in this site one from Quebec to Denver and other from Denver to Dominican Republic.. and i will buy my next flight from Dominican Republic to Quebec on the next week. The big vacation and I save to much money thanks to this site! Thanks u s much!!!
